resources.string:
Wordlete plays with you to test your vocabulary!
1. You and Wordlete will first be given an alphabet
2. Think of a dictionary word starting with the alphabet
3. Enter one letter at a time till you have letters left to guess
4. Wordlete will do the same but it will not choose a letter you chose last
(Remember, you could use this to spoof Wordlete!)
5. You will win only by adding letters that lead to a dictionary word
6. When prompted, enter the full word you thought.
7. If Wordlete enters a longer word, it wins; else, you win!

 Good Luck!"
